text: The 2008 Canadian Tour season ran from April to September and consisted of 15 golf tournaments. It was the 39th season of the Canadian Professional Golf Tour. The season started with two events in the United States (in April), followed by three events in Mexico (in April and May), and finishing with 10 events in Canada (in June through September). American John Ellis won the Order of Merit. ==Tournament schedule== {| class="wikitable" |- !Date!!Tournament!!Location!!Winner!!Purse |- |Apr 13||Spring International||California, United States|| Spencer Levin||US$100,000 |- |Apr 20||Stockton Sports Commission Classic||California, United States|| John Ellis||US$100,000 |- |Apr 27||Corona Mazatlan Mexican PGA Championship||Mexico|| John Ellis||US$125,000 |- |May 18||Iberostar Riviera Maya Open||Mexico|| Daniel Im||US$125,000 |- |May 25||La Loma San Luis Potosi Open||Mexico|| Russell Surber||US$125,000 |- |Jun 15||Times Colonist Open||British Columbia, Canada|| Daniel Im||C$150,000 |- |Jun 22||Greater Vancouver Charity Classic||British Columbia, Canada|| Adam Speirs||C$100,000 |- |Jun 29||ATB Financial Classic||Alberta, Canada|| Dustin Risdon||C$150,000 |- |Jul 6||Saskatchewan Open||Saskatchewan, Canada|| Josh Geary||C$150,000 |- |Jul 13||Telus Edmonton Open||Alberta, Canada|| John Ellis||C$150,000 |- |Jul 20||Canadian Tour Players Cup||Manitoba, Canada|| Wes Heffernan||C$200,000 |- |Aug 17||Desjardins Montreal Open||Montreal, Canada|| Graham DeLaet||C$200,000 |- |Aug 24||Jane Rogers Championship of Mississauga||Ontario, Canada|| Alex Coe||C$125,000 |- |Aug 31||Seaforth Country Classic||Ontario, Canada|| Kent Eger||C$150,000 |- |Sep 7||Canadian Tour Championship||Ontario, Canada|| Tom Stankowski||C$235,000 |} Source: ==External links== *Official site Canadian Tour Category:PGA Tour Canada
